resources.string: حدث خطأ أثناء جلب القنوات المشتركة.
"غير قادر علي التحقق مما إذا كان المستخدم قد اشترك في القناة (id=%s)"

Import your subscriptions from YouTube, by first visiting https://www.youtube.com/subscription_manager, and clicking the \"Export Subscriptions\" button at the bottom. Then, select the XML file you exported by clicking \"Select XML File\" below.
No YouTube channels were found in the XML file you uploaded.
No YouTube channels that you are not already subscribed to were found in the XML file you uploaded.
An error was encountered attempting to parse the XML file you uploaded: %s.
Failed to import your YouTube subscriptions.
